channel.title: After morphing, I can not start distrobox
channel.description: After morphing, I can not start distrobox distrobox enter my-ubuntu WARN[0000] "/" is not a shared mount, this could cause issues or missing mounts with rootless containers ERRO[0000] running `/usr/bin/newuidmap 2660 0 1000 1 1 100000 65536`: Error: cannot set up namespace using "/usr/bin/newuidmap": fork/exec /usr/bin/newuidmap: permission denied I couldnt change this error. Could you try to reproduce and write a solution to problem? Thanks

item.title: After morphing, I can not start distrobox
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
SUID Disabler and Permission Hardener could be the issue.

linuxer:

/usr/bin/newuidmap

Re-enable Specific SUID Binaries

sudo permission-hardener disable /usr/bin/newuidmap

Read full topic
item.source: After morphing, I can not start distrobox

item.title: After morphing, I can not start distrobox
item.dc:creator: linuxer
item.description:
After morphing, I can not start distrobox
distrobox enter my-ubuntu
WARN[0000] “/” is not a shared mount, this could cause issues or missing mounts with rootless containers
ERRO[0000] running /usr/bin/newuidmap 2660 0 1000 1 1 100000 65536:
Error: cannot set up namespace using “/usr/bin/newuidmap”: fork/exec /usr/bin/newuidmap: permission denied
I couldnt change this error. Could you try to reproduce and write a solution to problem? Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: After morphing, I can not start distrobox
